settings.title: THE POWER OF epigenetics
settings.text: Every choice you make—from what you eat to how you move and manage stress—shapes how you age and how your DNA is expressed. Tracking your biological age offers powerful insights into how these daily decisions affect your health over time.

settings.slide_item_text: The OMICmAge algorithm, developed with Harvard University, offers the most advanced way to understand your biological age. It analyzes proteins, metabolites, and clinical biomarkers to provide a precise picture of how your body is aging. More than just measuring age, OMICmAge reveals the factors influencing your aging process.

Developed by Yale University, the SYMPHONYAge algorithm reveals how eleven key organ systems—like the brain, liver, heart, and immune system—are aging, both independently and together. This perspective highlights areas where lifestyle interventions can make the most impact.

Discover how quickly or slowly your body is aging with the DunedinPACE algorithm, which compares your rate of aging to a standard calendar year. Based on the renowned ongoing Dunedin Multidisciplinary Health and Development Study, this 3rd generation technology provides the clearest way to track the effectiveness of lifestyle changes over time.

settings.title: 3 WAYS TO MEASURE YOUR AGE powered by
settings.text: Gain a comprehensive view of your aging journey with the three most advanced aging outputs—all included in your personalized report. From cellular health to organ systems and your overall pace of aging, these measurements offer deep insights into how your body is aging for a holistic perspective.

settings.text_section: Forget “a glass of wine a day”—elevate to a daily antioxidant celebration. Each shot delivers 220 mg of 98% purity resveratrol, equal to the benefits of 43 bottles of red wine, without the alcohol. Toast to vibrant health and longevity with every sip.

settings.title: Return
settings.text: Send your sample in the provided mailer.

settings.title: Optimize
settings.text: Use your insights to make meaningful changes.

settings.title: A guiding light
settings.text:
Co-founded by renowned longevity expert Dr. Daniel Yadegar, Happy Aging bridges the worlds of cutting-edge science and holistic wellness. A Harvard-trained physician with advanced fellowship training in age management and regenerative medicine, Dr. Yadegar brings an unmatched depth of expertise to our mission.

Dr. Yadegar’s extensive knowledge and passion for longevity guide our development and innovation. Together, we are dedicated to revolutionizing the way we experience aging.

settings.question: What is the Longevity Shot made of?
settings.answer: The Longevity Shot is crafted entirely from all-natural ingredients, with 80% of the ingredients being non-GMO. It is gluten-free, vegan, caffeine-free, soy-free, and dairy-free, with no synthetic ingredients, artificial sweeteners, preservatives, or artificial colors/flavors. Each shot contains 18 calories per serving.

settings.question: Does the Longevity Shot contain sugar or alcohol?
settings.answer: The Longevity Shot contains 2.5 grams of natural sugar from apple and grape juice concentrate. It is also lightly sweetened with steviol glycosides, a natural sweetener derived from the Stevia rebaudiana plant that is sugar and calorie-free. It is alcohol-free.

settings.question: Is the Longevity Shot safe for those with allergies or dietary restrictions?
settings.answer: Yes, the Longevity Shot is free from common allergens like nuts, soy, dairy, and gluten, making it suitable for most women with dietary sensitivities. Additionally, it can fit into most keto diets.

settings.question: Is the Longevity Shots tested on animals?
settings.answer: No, the Longevity Shot is not tested on animals.

settings.question: Can I take the Longevity Shot if I’m pregnant or breastfeeding?
settings.answer: While the Longevity Shot is made with natural ingredients, we always recommend that pregnant or breastfeeding women consult their healthcare provider to ensure it aligns with their unique health needs during this time.

settings.question: How should I take the Longevity Shot, and when is the best time?
settings.answer: For optimal results, we recommend taking two shots per week, at any time of the day. This schedule helps maintain NAD+ levels and activate sirtuins—proteins vital for cellular health, DNA repair, and metabolic function. This intermittent dosing supports long-term vitality and overall longevity, slowing the aging process without overwhelming your body.

settings.question: When will I see results from the Longevity Shot?
settings.answer: The timing of results can vary depending on your body and lifestyle. Many women begin to notice positive changes in energy, skin health, and overall well-being within the first 30 days of regular use.

settings.question: How long should I continue taking the Longevity Shot?
settings.answer: The long-term benefits of the Longevity Shot—such as cellular health support and slowing the aging process—are best experienced over time with consistent use.

settings.question: Are there any side effects of interactions with medications?
settings.answer: The natural ingredients in the Longevity Shot are generally well-tolerated, but everyone is unique. If you’re taking any prescription medications or have a medical condition, particularly autoimmune conditions, we encourage you to consult your healthcare provider before starting the Longevity Shot.

settings.question: Is the Longevity Shot suitable for children or teenagers?
settings.answer: The Longevity Shot is formulated with adults in mind. If you’re considering it for children or teenagers, we recommend speaking with a healthcare provider to ensure it’s appropriate for their needs.

settings.question: Is the Longevity Shot Kosher or Halal certified?
settings.answer: No, the Longevity Shot is not currently Kosher or Halal certified.
